title: Microsoft cinemania '95 (MAC)
brief_description: An excellent reference multi-media programme for cinema research purposes. It features film-clips, dialogue and stills from over one hundred films as well as a comprehensive listing of international cinema that can be accessed by title; director; or actor. Film sources are from Pauline Kaels’ “5000 Nights at the Movies” and from the books of Roger Ebert and Ephraim Katz. SYSTEM REQUIRMENTS: Any Macintosh computer that supports a 256-colour, 13” (640x 480) of higher resolution monitor. System 7 or later. 4 Mb of memory, however 5-8Mb strongly recommended and 4Mb of available hard disk space.
